#summary What the responsibilities of each person are.

== Customers ==

  * Provide [http://www.jamesshore.com/Agile-Book/vision.html vision]
  * Define acceptance criteria
  * Decide which features are most important
  * Guide the developers

== Developers ==

  * Assigns [http://www.jamesshore.com/Agile-Book/estimating.html complexity] to [http://www.jamesshore.com/Agile-Book/stories.html stories] along with QAs
  * Write code that fulfills the acceptance criteria
  * Collaborates with the customers
  * Ask the other developers for feedback

== QAs ==

  * Assign complexity to stories along with developers
  * Ensure that stories are [http://www.jamesshore.com/Agile-Book/done_done.html done done]
  * Ensure that the developers did not break existing features
  * Try to find bugs
